fields.name: Chain Mail
fields.description: A suit of interlocking metal rings, providing good protection without hindering mobility.

fields.name: Shield
fields.description: A piece of wood or metal held in the hand or attached to the arm, used to block attacks.

fields.name: Holy Symbol
fields.description: A representation of a deity or religious symbol, used by paladins to focus their divine powers.

fields.name: Arcane Focus
fields.description: A crystal, orb, rod, staff, or wand used by spellcasters to channel their magical energy.

fields.name: Spellbook
fields.description: A book containing a spellcaster's collection of spells, used to prepare and cast spells.

fields.name: Pearl of Power
fields.description: A small, enchanted pearl that can restore expended spell slots to a spellcaster.

fields.name: Backpack
fields.description: A sturdy bag with multiple compartments, used to carry various items.

fields.name: Rope, Hempen
fields.description: A strong, durable rope made from hemp fibers.

fields.name: Torch
fields.description: A stick with a flammable material at one end, used to provide light.

fields.name: Waterskin
fields.description: A container made from animal skin, used to carry water.

fields.name: Bedroll
fields.description: A simple cloth bedroll used for sleeping on the ground.

fields.name: Mess Kit
fields.description: A collection of utensils used for eating meals.

fields.name: Tinderbox
fields.description: A small box containing flint, steel, and tinder used to start fires.

fields.name: Tent
fields.description: A portable shelter made from canvas and supported by poles.

fields.name: Alchemist's Fire
fields.description: A sticky, adhesive substance that ignites when exposed to air, used as a weapon.

fields.name: Ball Bearings
fields.description: Small metal spheres used to create a hazard on the ground.

fields.name: Caltrops
fields.description: Small metal spikes used to create a hazard on the ground.

fields.name: Healer's Kit
fields.description: A collection of bandages, salves, and other medical supplies used to stabilize injured creatures.

fields.name: Holy Water
fields.description: A vial of blessed water that deals extra damage to undead creatures.

fields.name: Hunting Trap
fields.description: A mechanical device used to trap animals.

fields.name: Oil
fields.description: A flammable liquid used to create fires or coat objects.

fields.name: Potion of Healing
fields.description: A magical potion that restores hit points when consumed. restores 2d4 + 2 hit points.

fields.name: Potion of Greater Healing
fields.description: A more powerful magical potion that restores hit points when consumed. restores 4d4 + 4 hit points.

fields.name: Potion of Superior Healing
fields.description: An even more powerful magical potion that restores hit points when consumed. restores 8d4 + 8 hit points.

fields.name: Potion of Supreme Healing
fields.description: The most powerful magical potion that restores hit points when consumed. restores 10d4 + 20 hit points.

fields.name: Potion of Climbing
fields.description: A magical potion that grants the ability to climb difficult surfaces for a duration of one hour.

fields.name: Potion of Invisibility
fields.description: A magical potion that grants invisibility to the drinker for a duration of one hour.

fields.name: Potion of Fire Resistance
fields.description: A magical potion that grants resistance to fire damage for a duration of one hour.

fields.name: Potion of Water Breathing
fields.description: A magical potion that grants the ability to breathe underwater for a duration of one hour.

fields.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
fields.description: A magical potion that grants the ability to communicate with animals for a duration of one hour.
